entry_emr_id.description: Refers to the entry that this attribute pertains to.

attribute_id.description: The attribute that is being described.

code_system.description: The name of the system that defines the code value.

code_value.description: A code value for the attribute. Code system must be populated.

text_value.description: A text value for the attribute.

date_value.description: A date value for the attribute.

boolean_value.description: A boolean value for the attribute.

numeric_value.description: A numeric value for the attribute.

emr_id.description: The unique identifier of the source record within the EMR.

emr_reference.description: No set purpose. For use by the EMR adapter.

emr_effective_date.description: The date and time that the attribute was effective within the EMR for the entry.
